This tutorial will teach the user how to navigate through the application and how to play the game and track their fitness activities. \n\nClick next or previous to navigate through the tutorial.

In the home screen you are able to view your current map level and progress on that map.
You are also able to view your current statistic points in each category.

 At the bottom of every page there is a navigation panel that allows the user to jump to important pages (Home, Fitness, Game Map, and Settings).

This page shows a calendar. Dates that have a recorded history will show an orange dot under the date.
 Clicking on one of those dates will show you your fitness history on that page. Clicking on any other date will show no history.

 You can start tracking a new activity by clicking the "Track Activity" button or you can manually add an activity by selecting the "Add Activity" button.

This pages shows your selected dates history and information about each fitness activity.
 Clicking on "Add Activity" from this page will set the date for the added activity to the current selected date.

 To get back to the calendar view click on the Fitness tab.

This page allows you to select an activity from the drop down menu.
 Then clicking "Start" will begin tracking the selected activity.
 Clicking "Cancel" will cancel activity selection.

 The tracking page shows your elapsed time and other necessary information during tracking.

This page allows you to select an activity from the drop down menu.
 Then you can enter all the statistics you need to record for your tracking purposes.

 Clicking "Save" will save the information.
 Clicking "Clear" will erase any input information.

This page shows your current map progress.

 Blue Node: Current node location
 Yellow Node: Open node
 Red Node: Boss node location


Click on any node connected to your current location to move to that node. Confirm your selection by clicking on "Confirm" on the popup menu. Clicking cancel will cancel your selection.
 After the elapsed travel time a popup menu will display your finished fitness activities since your last node movemnet and what character statistics will be improved. Click confirm to continue.
 The boss node will prompt to "Begin Combat"

The combat screen shows your health, the boss health and the cooldown of your attack.

 To attack the boss, click on the blue circle in the center of the screen.
 When the boss's health reaches 0, you win. If your health reaches 0, you lose.

This screen allows you to update your personal information such as height and weight and displays the last time you updated your information.

 The AboutMe allows you to view information about the application.
 The Tutorial allows you to view the tutorial for the application.
